directive_ref: CEO DIRECTIVE WAVE 15/15A - AUTONOMOUS GOLDEN NEEDLE HUNT WITH SOURCE ATTRIBUTION

source_attribution.search_query: (BTC OR ETH OR SOL OR bitcoin OR ethereum OR solana OR altcoin) layer2 breakout trading

sources.snippet_or_excerpt: The crypto market is picking up again. The total market value has risen to $3.55 trillion, up more than 1% in the last day.
Learn about the competition between Polygon (MATIC) vs Arbitrum (ARB) and what it means for Ethereum users and developers.
Arbitrum (ARB), a leading Layer-2 scaling solution for Ethereum, has captured the attention of cryptocurrency analysts and traders alike.
Solana remains one of the strongest Layer 1s in crypto, but even the most loyal holders admit: it's not moving much right now.
Bitcoin is retesting the golden cross, a technical formation that has historically preceded massive rallies, but as traders await...

hypothesis_content.title: Failed L2 Breakout Fade in High Stress
hypothesis_content.statement: During STRESS/BEAR regimes, when an L2 token breaks above 5-day high but closes below opening price with volume < 80% of average (failed breakout), it will mean revert with 70%+ probability, dropping 8%+ within 3 days.
hypothesis_content.rationale: In weak regimes, low-volume breakouts are often bull traps. L2 tokens are particularly vulnerable to failed breakouts due to lower liquidity and higher volatility. The close below open confirms selling pressure and likely reversal.
entry_conditions: Market regime: STRESS or BEAR (VIX > 25 or Crypto Fear & Greed < 30)
L2 token breaks above 5-day high intraday

exit_conditions.take_profit: 8% drop from entry OR 3 days elapsed
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Token closes above failed breakout high

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Less than 70% of such failed breakouts lead to 8%+ declines within 3 days during STRESS/BEAR regimes.
